lender.name: Susie
lender.loan_because: I feel it is important to be able to help someone start or upgrade their own business. Funding through Kiva allows me to see where my funds are going and how it is affecting the community.

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: I can. ....and if someone can get support with their dream to improve their life, I am happy to be able to do that.
lender.occupational_info: Empowering individuals with disabilities and their families to achieve their goals as a leader of a nonprofit organization

lender.name: Terry and Peter
lender.loan_because: I'm lucky enough to be able to!

lender.name: Andy and Nicole
lender.loan_because: we believe in helping people help themselves. We also loan because God has given to us so abundantly that there is no excuse for us not to help.
lender.occupational_info: A soon-to-be elementary school teacher and an elementary school nurse.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: Many wonderful people need a hand...
lender.occupational_info: I work with men who are incarcerated, helping them to successfully reintegrate back into society.

lender.name: John and Karen
lender.loan_because: I'd like to help people in poverty succeed personally and financially and perhaps enhance the well being of their communities.
lender.occupational_info: Finance/Accounting

lender.name: Gayla
lender.loan_because: I want to offer people the opportunity to be in control of their own financial lives and be free from poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I design artwork for advertising products and services.

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: To whom much is given, much is expected...or...Be the change you wish to see in the word...both fit, take your pick!
lender.occupational_info: I'm an administrator at a Community Mental Health Center.

lender.name: Alli
lender.loan_because: I like to see people happy.

lender.name: richard
lender.occupational_info: By asking the right questions, I help individuals unleash the full potential within themselves.

lender.name: Doug
lender.loan_because: The world is a better place when people help people no matter where they are from.
lender.occupational_info: I install products on floors in houses

lender.name: Lee & Sharon
lender.loan_because: All the happiness in the world comes from making other happy!!

lender.name: Lyman
lender.loan_because: Responsible people deserve an opportunity to grow their businesses and become successful if they are willing to work hard. Borrowing money should not be prohibitive in cost. Americans are wealthy in many ways; this is an opportunity to share with our brothers and sisters around the world.
lender.occupational_info: I help people in the United States who are trying to plan their finances so that they can plan to realize their dreams and live comfortably within their financial means.

lender.name: Gail
lender.loan_because: These loans really make a difference. They don't just go into a blackhole. You see the results. You get the money back to lend again. There's a sense of responsibility & dream & business building that goes out with this gift. Can't recommend this process enough.
lender.occupational_info: Through buying & selling homes & land, and other investments, I make a living.

lender.name: Terry & Ginny
lender.loan_because: Our niece, Jessica, is co-founder and motivated us to loan.
lender.occupational_info: We both work with children, hoping to make a difference in their lives and the direction they will go

lender.name: Kim
lender.loan_because: it's a great way to help others

lender.name: Lily
lender.loan_because: I want to help other girls make a better life for themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I'm almost 6! My mom is a baby nurse and my dad is in the energy industry.

lender.name: Patrick and Kathryn
lender.loan_because: How can I not? I have thought that microloans were a great idea for a long time and am excited that Kiva provides a way for me to be involved personally.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a university and study different issues related to international development in countries where there have been crises like war or natural disasters.

lender.name: Jenene
lender.loan_because: I want to support women who are struggling to make a living in hard circumstances.

lender.name: Justin
lender.loan_because: I have a good life and it makes me happy.

lender.name: Sandy
lender.loan_because: Helping each other is how we all get by.

lender.name: Donna
lender.loan_because: I am able to

lender.name: Niles
lender.loan_because: I believe that lending to small business is great for development and that the individual is the most accountable entity for my hard earned funds.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a large US bank and this is a great opportunity for my to learn more about the lending and underwriting process.

lender.name: D&V
lender.loan_because: I have.
lender.occupational_info: Having, mostly. Minimal giving.

lender.name: Rich and Jane
lender.loan_because: We want to help others who have not had the opportunities that we have had.
lender.occupational_info: Medical Education

lender.name: Faylin
lender.loan_because: The most important thing we can do as humans is to help those in need and work together for a better future. "The wheels of change are not driven by inevitibility. It is always the right time to do right." Martin Luther King Jr.
lender.occupational_info: I recently graduated university with a Globalization/anthropology/political science degree. I plan on attending law school for international human rights. I want to work to decrease the global wealth gap, poverty, and disease.I'm 23, I'm from New York, and i love animals! :)

lender.name: roger
lender.loan_because: isn't it obvious? kiva is fantastic!
lender.occupational_info: i design, build and test instruments, fluidics and mechanisms.

lender.name: Harry
lender.occupation: Physical Therapist Asst./Web Design and Developer

lender.name: Ben and Roma
lender.loan_because: We want to keep hope alive.

lender.name: Cathleen
lender.loan_because: This is a way I feel I can make a small but positive difference in the lives of people I would not otherwise have the opportunity to know.
lender.occupational_info: Retire3d as manager at a semiconductor mfg in the San Fran bay area. Relocated to Albuquerque where I volunteer at the spca cattery and support the New Mexico symphony and local theatre scene.

lender.name: Kevin Anderson
lender.loan_because: love

lender.name: Constance
lender.loan_because: During my life other people have helped me. I would like to be a part of that spirit of helping as others have been.
lender.occupational_info: Currently I work with environmental labs that analyze water, soil, and air. A while ago I was co-director of a food bank, and it was the best full time/part-time position I have had.

lender.name: Kurt
lender.loan_because: I am blessed with a great life and I want to give back to the world that has given so much to me.

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: i can

lender.name: Yasir
lender.loan_because: I like to help people in need.
lender.occupational_info: I service and repair photographic equipment in my family's camera repair business.

lender.name: Rich
lender.loan_because: I can now because people (and the US taxpayer! woohoo public school!) helped me
lender.occupational_info: I work for a company that makes prescription medicine.

lender.name: Moshe & Michal
lender.loan_because: We have too much money :P
lender.occupational_info: He: a phD student of Physics. She: Paramedic. We are an Israeli couple, living in switzerland.

lender.name: dustin
lender.loan_because: hard working people deserve a shot at a better life

lender.name: Melissa and Erik
lender.loan_because: we know we have more than we need and are blessed to be able to share with others.
lender.occupational_info: student/stay at home mom and labor union staff representative

lender.name: herold
lender.loan_because: i love helping those in need, everyone needs and deserve a fresh start....
lender.occupational_info: networking, with various businesses...getting involve hands on with numerous tasks...getting things done...

lender.name: Melody
lender.occupation: Writer (and recruiter because I have to eat)
lender.loan_because: someone has to do it, and it might as well be me.
lender.occupational_info: I write plays about world issues.

lender.name: Sonia and Kris
lender.loan_because: it just feels right ;))

lender.name: Katie
lender.loan_because: I want to support women who are trying to support their families
lender.occupational_info: I am a doctor

lender.name: Flanagan
lender.loan_because: I went to prison for drug possesion and now want to give back instead of always being a taker. Also I have had a few small businesses of my own and I can appreciate what it takes to get it done. Every business in this world started as a small business.
lender.occupational_info: I sell, install and repair automotive tires.

lender.name: Ronald
lender.occupational_info: technical guru - I specialize in geophysical seismic data to explore the earth underground.

lender.name: Jenny and Vivek
lender.loan_because: This is a wonderful and easy opportunity to help others achieve their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I work in marketing and my husband is a computer programmer.

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: There are three main reasons why I loan through KIVA. 1.I think it's important that no matter how little money you might have you must try to make the world a better place. 2. I've been lucky enough to have traveled to about 25 different countries. I've thoroughly enjoyed every one of them. This is my way of giving back. 3. IT FEELS GREAT!!!
lender.occupational_info: I work for Amtrak which is the US national train line. I'm a Train Conductor. I'm the guy who has the really cool job of yelling "ALL ABOARD!!!" The Train Conductor is the person who is in charge of the train. Whatever happens with the train from telling the engineer (the train driver) to pull out of the station to collecting and selling tickets to helping passengers to making announcements and keeping track of all the different forms and train orders. I work on trains traveling between New York City and Washington, DC. I've been working there for nearly 18 years.

lender.name: Sarah & Jamie
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves to take a chance & we all need a little help sometimes. Thank you for this privilege.
lender.occupational_info: Try to leave the world a little nicer.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of assisting small businesses. Most businesses are small businesses. When I donate to large charities, I'm not always sure where the money is going. With Kiva, I know exactly who is getting the money and for what.
lender.occupational_info: I write instructions on how to use computer programs.

lender.name: Cindy
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping people help themselves and their community.
lender.occupational_info: I work with numbers and information to help people make better decisions about their money and business.

lender.name: Lilo
lender.loan_because: It's a good use of my money and I like to support female entrepreneurs.
lender.occupational_info: I help companies better understand their customers.

lender.name: Hannah
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: I help another family care for and love their children, and it is wonderful!

lender.name: mike
lender.loan_because: sharing is good

lender.name: Kaeri & Bob
lender.loan_because: We can.

lender.name: Brad
lender.loan_because: We have so much in this country. I can't help but share some of what I have with others who are working so hard to make a living. This really brings me great satisfaction.
lender.occupational_info: I work for the Post Office delivering mail. I am an aspiring entrepreneur and I want to help others reach their goals.

lender.name: Patrick
lender.loan_because: I want to help others who need the money so that they can better help their families and themselves.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: It's fun and it makes the world a better place.
lender.occupational_info: I run a company that creates multi-player online games.

lender.name: Steve Hayhurst
lender.loan_because:
I'm sure many of you participating with KIVA have heard of the Starfish Story. In this instance, I want to be like that Old Man, Peace.
-- The Starfish Story --
A young man is walking along the ocean and sees a beach on which thousands and thousands of starfish have washed ashore. Further along he sees an old man, walking slowly and stooping often, picking up one starfish after another and tossing each one gently into the ocean.
"Why are you throwing starfish into the ocean?," he asks.
"Because the sun is up and the tide is going out and if I don't throw them further in they will die."
"But, old man, don't you realize there are miles and miles of beach and starfish all along it! You can't possibly save them all, you can't even save one-tenth of them. In fact, even if you work all day, your efforts won't make any difference at all."
The old man listened calmly and then bent down to pick up another starfish and gently tossed it into the sea. "It made a difference to that one."
Thank you to KIVA staff, to all the KIVA lenders and recipients for making this a better world.

lender.name: sa helper
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I represent the kindness and giving of the people of San Antonio, Texas. I am out to help others earn their way out of poverty and watch them change their lives forever.

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: through zaadz I found out about KIVA
lender.occupational_info: a job where I can be of service to others

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed with family, education, health, a good job and the love of a wonderful life partner.
lender.occupational_info: I teach psychology to adult learners at a local community college, and work for a program that provides education to physicians in the care of people with HIV/AIDS.

lender.name: Rich
lender.loan_because: I want to.
lender.occupational_info: I'm incredibly blessed with my job and my life.

lender.name: Roly
lender.loan_because: I like to help people :)

lender.name: Michelle & Jarvis
lender.loan_because: We loan because we believe in paying it forward. We also believe every individual can make a difference.

lender.name: Mari
lender.occupational_info: design.art.space.product.structure.construction

lender.name: Langdon
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance to prosper!

lender.name: Bill
lender.loan_because: This is the right way to promote freedom.

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: I saw the Frontline PBS show on Kiva and I saw how micro-loans work while traveling in Ghana.

lender.name: Johanna
lender.loan_because: I feel lucky to be able to loan a small amount of money that may have a big impact on one's life. Thank you.

lender.name: Kathrin
lender.loan_because: its empowering people!

lender.name: Charles
lender.loan_because: I wish to make a positive karmic connection with other human beings. Blessings should be shared.
lender.occupational_info: In a time of significant global challenges, I help educate and engage the public about the importance of biodiversity, human impact on the natural world, and the riches of nature and human cultures.

lender.name: Keith & Dorothy
lender.loan_because: We want to make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: We grow grass to graze cattle.

lender.name: Suzanne
lender.occupational_info: I am a second grade classroom teacher.

lender.name: john
lender.loan_because: We lived on a farm when we were kids and we never had enough food. We grew berries. We had chickens, but the hungry fox would sometimes take our eggs or eat one of our chickens. When we had a lot of eggs we traded our chicken eggs for our neighbor's cow milk. It was better than army surplus powdered milk. Trading stuff made a difference. We still grow berries today. Marionberries, Blueberries. Strawberries, Red Raspberries, Black Raspberries and Boysenberries.

lender.name: John R
lender.loan_because: I like having a choice in whom I help. In my life, I have wasted much of what was given to me, and have only valued those things for which I've had to work. I don't wish to join any teams.
lender.occupational_info: I find answers.

lender.name: L. W.
lender.loan_because: George W. Bush's disdain for foreign aid inspired me to be a Kiva lender. More recently, the books "Half the Sky" and "Three Cups of Tea" have made me want to redouble my efforts.
lender.occupational_info: volunteer work

lender.name: Raju Uppalapati
lender.loan_because: I am thrilled seeing the positive impact that micro-finance can make on society
lender.occupational_info: I work as a software developer building multiuser internet applications that power sites like Kiva

lender.name: Beth, Casandra, Avy, Tim
lender.loan_because: we can!

lender.name: Lowell
lender.loan_because: A wonderful way to help around the world without having to leave my computer!
lender.occupational_info: I served in inner city ministries and as a chaplain

lender.name: Larry
lender.loan_because: It's fun!

lender.name: Suzanne
lender.loan_because: I have traveled to many developing countries and have seen how hard people work to feed their families and stay alive.
lender.occupational_info: I worked at a theater where musicians perform. I wrote about the shows for newspapers and the internet.

lender.name: Rick
lender.occupational_info: I help protect children from being harmed.

lender.name: meena
lender.loan_because: I hope to contribute in a small way to make things better in this world.

lender.name: joe
lender.loan_because: I believe that people can change the world one person at a time. I have been very fortunate to live a comfortable life. This is truly a win/win situation.
lender.occupational_info: I work with computers at an internet company that. In my free time I play music.

lender.name: Ann and Ted
lender.loan_because: It is amazing what people can do if given the opportunity.

lender.name: Riccardo
lender.loan_because: I believe microcredit is an helpful tool for poor people to get resources and develop themselves.

lender.name: Jon and Melissa
lender.loan_because: We believe in supporting developing economies around the world. Prosperity breeds stability!

lender.name: Todd
lender.loan_because: It is needed.

lender.name: Charlie
lender.loan_because: I feel it is the duty of Christians to be generous and helpful to those in need. Offering a small loan to those who are trying to better themselves seems like such a natural thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: Describe my work to someone across the world? I work with a computer network in a hospital environment. I try to make sure that the network is safe and doesn't fail.

lender.name: Tim
lender.loan_because: I want to be generous
lender.occupational_info: I am a composer and a musician.

lender.name: Carolyn
lender.loan_because: My money goes so much further in a developing country. The internet has made it possible to help someone across the world in such a direct way. And it's so respectful- it's a loan, not a handout.
lender.occupational_info: I work with an NGO that pays a portion of the rent for low-income single mothers who are in school. They are studying to find a job that will increase their income so they can support their families.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: I was motivated through my church to try to make a positive impact on people.
lender.occupational_info: I advise entrepreneurs how to manage their businesses more efficiently to achieve higher profits and greater public good.

lender.name: Patrick
lender.occupational_info: I help large companies improve the speed and cost of the IT operations.

lender.name: Mico
lender.loan_because: I can help make a difference, and I hope to set an example for others.
lender.occupational_info: I work in measuring individual cost components used for pricing different products.

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of being able to help others improve their lives and their communities.

lender.name: christopher
lender.loan_because: I want all sentient beings to know happiness and the roots of happiness.

lender.name: Ivan
lender.loan_because: I was born in a third world country and have seen first hand the struggles of people trying to better their lives; I want to contribute to someone's success by providing a portion of the resources they need. Like the saying goes "One person can't change the world, but together we may change the world for one person".

lender.name: Stacey
lender.loan_because: I asked my sons, who say we're really lucky to have a good life and we should help others to succeed and to be happy. They are excited about how Kiva can help loan our money to assist others with their lives.
lender.occupational_info: Human Resources is all about helping others reach their full potential.

lender.name: Bela
lender.loan_because: I know that with a little help, some individuals will be able to progress, and make a beter future for themselves,
lender.occupational_info: Business development, try to bring to my company deals that make money

lender.name: Denis
lender.loan_because: I admire these entrepreneurs and I want to help them succeed.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a non-profit in New York City.

lender.name: Beverley
lender.loan_because: I want to help people who are interested in helping themselves
lender.occupational_info: I verify documentation for the Canadian government

lender.name: Lindig
lender.loan_because: I'd like to help women anywhere who need to support their families.
lender.occupational_info: I sell and trade used books in good condition.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: helping people who work hard and live by the rules deserve an occasional pat on the back and a helping hand.

lender.name: Kristin
lender.loan_because: It makes me happy.
lender.occupational_info: I help students learn even when they can't go to school.

lender.name: hoopland
lender.loan_because: "to help"
lender.occupational_info: We learn about people, problem solving, math, reading and writing. We like self directed learning. The first 4 letters of kindergarten spell "kind".

lender.name: Shonie
lender.loan_because: I have more than enough "stuff" in my life and so I want to share my wealth with others. I want to help women around the world become more empowered, confident, and successful.
lender.occupational_info:
I work in an office writing software for a telecommunications company. I have been in this line of work for 15 years.
I am extremely grateful for the path my career has taken and for the lessons I have learned along the way. However, I often dream of quitting my job, selling all my crap, buying a house on a beautiful white-sand beach, and becoming a beer and hot-dog vendor.

lender.name: Ross
lender.loan_because: I think Kiva is a kick ass idea! I am very lucky to have the things I have and after working for a summer in Kenya with some of Africa's poorest kids, I know that a little can go a long way. So...loan to someone and you will feel great about it and help someone motivated, towards independence!
lender.occupational_info: I run a website that promotes positive social and economic development. We are an online community for people passionate about travel and the world's people and evironment.

lender.name: Sara
lender.loan_because: We all need to do our part.

lender.name: K. Q.
lender.loan_because: I want to share, and hope what I give/lend makes someone life better... Make a life not a living.
lender.occupational_info: If possible do something you love, and then it won't feel so much like work...

lender.name: Slavisa
lender.loan_because: I am inspired by the hard work and determination that people across the world possess. Hopefully my contributions will have a direct impact on improving someone's quality of life.

lender.name: hannah
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in the world.

lender.name: Johann
lender.loan_because: I have been helped by others and I have lived with AIDS for 26 years.
lender.occupational_info: I am in my 50s, pursuing a MS in Traditional Chinese Medicine which includes acupuncture.

lender.name: Dave
lender.occupational_info: I teach poor urban children in the city of Chicago. As much of what I teach involves communicating about social-justice and the global distribution of wealth, it makes sense for me to lead by example. It is with this in mind that I hope my students will follow my example and learn how to be more compassionate in their own lives.

lender.name: Susie
lender.loan_because: I can. It's so much more blessed to give...and to see others succeed.

lender.name: Yvonne
lender.loan_because: it is my spiritual responsibility to help others. I loan in the hopes that one day the recipient would pay it forward. I loan in honor of my mother who taught me to give unselfishly and ask for nothing in return.
lender.occupational_info: Semi-retired teacher. At the present time my husband and I are teaching English in China.

lender.name: Lori
lender.loan_because: I have been very fortunate in life. I strongly believe that I should pass that along and help people as much as I can.
lender.occupational_info: I am a graduate student in heritage management. I will be working to preserve and protect the world's heritage. I am especially interested in indigenous peoples and working with them to ensure their cultures will continue and flourish. I want to in turn educate people about the cultures I work with in order to increase understanding, tolerance and an appreciation of the wonderful world in which we live.

lender.name: Deborah
lender.loan_because: I want to help empower people especially women and do what I can to help end poverty. I want to show that small changes and small acts done by many can turn into Major change. We are a global community that needs to take care of one another.
lender.occupational_info: Sr. Marketing Manager for G4 TV.

lender.name: Didier
lender.loan_because: Because everyone should deserve a chance for a descent life.
lender.occupational_info: I work with aircrafts.

lender.name: Jonathan
lender.loan_because: The current system of aid isn't working the way it should.
lender.occupational_info: I write music for TV - the music that plays in the background for things like the Discovery Channel and I teach how to write music at a college.

lender.name: Josh
lender.loan_because: I am an entrepreneur and value that quality very much. I would love to help people start their own business.
lender.occupational_info: bringing writers and readers together

lender.name: Emma
lender.loan_because: I want to help women to have better lives.
lender.occupational_info: I have worked with immigrant families here in the USA,and they have enriched my life.

lender.name: Ron
lender.loan_because: I want to help entrepreneurs further capitalism throughout the world

lender.name: Seth
lender.loan_because: I have seen the impact that a small amount of capital can have on an individual, a family, and a community. This organization is a fantastic idea and I want to be a part of it.
lender.occupational_info: I work concentrate on food security and micro-finance in the developing world, mainly West Africa

lender.name: Sahab
lender.loan_because: its a great way to help people in need.

lender.name: The Ehli
lender.loan_because: We're just trying to help where help is needed most.
lender.occupational_info: Sheldon works in healthcare services Kelly is a sporting goods manager

lender.name: SEG
lender.loan_because:
The Social Entrepreneurs of Grinnell (SEG) seek to foster mutually empowering connections between the developed and developing world. SEG works to give agency to individuals in order to address social and economic problems of inequality.
We loan because we think that micro-financing is a way for all individuals to participate in development efforts around the world. We want to enable people to invest in their own lives; we want all people of the world to be able to create a better life for themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: The Social Entrepreneurs of Grinnell is a student run campus group based in Grinnell College, Grinnell, Iowa.

lender.name: Tonya
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate enough to be in the position to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I organize photo shoots for advertisements.

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: I want to make the world a better place

lender.name: Carol
lender.loan_because: This is one of the best uses of the internet that I've seen! It is great to be able to pool our money and loan it to people who can use it to improve their lives. The personal nature of this type of lending gives us all a stake in the welfare and success of our friends around the world.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a public library and help people find information. Anyone can use the public library to access information and to borrow books and other types of media.

lender.name: Courtney
lender.loan_because: I believe if I only had proximity to people in need, I would make very different choices about where I spend my time, money, and energy. Thank you to Kiva for closing that gap!
lender.occupational_info: I am a business student and hope one day to be an entrepreneur myself, focused on making public education better for kids in urban environments.

lender.name: Quentin
lender.loan_because: Everyone needs a little help now and then. Its good karma. Maybe if I need help someday, someone will be there for me too.
lender.occupational_info: I help people plan parties. Sometimes the most important days of their lives, like weddings.

lender.name: Rengie
lender.loan_because: Turn something small I have to make a little difference.

lender.name: Bill Doyle
lender.loan_because: I believe individuals need to help individuals and fill the lending void created by Institutional-Commercial Banks and the World Bank . We need to help people in countries not favored by the First World.

lender.name: thomas
lender.loan_because: I want to help small business's around the world become part of the global community.
lender.occupational_info: I am President of a financial consulting firm primarily involved in World Equity Research and Money Management. My firm also manages a mutual fund and and Exchange traded fund in America.

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: I've been given much more than others on this planet. I learned to share in kindergarten.
lender.occupational_info: I create web sites and computer programs.

lender.name: Don
lender.loan_because: A way to give back and support people trying to get ahead.
lender.occupational_info: Budgeting at an astronomy observatory.

lender.name: Susan & Alex & kids
lender.loan_because: Besides all of the other usual great reasons, we want to teach our children about others in the world and their circumstances and culture. We are loaning with our 4 yr old & 6 yr old. The kids enjoyed choosing someone to loan to, hearing about their business, and finding the country on the map.

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: What a great site. Thanks

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: Everyone could use a helping hand.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a risk management professional with a Canadian bank.

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: My wife JoAnn and I saw Kiva profiled on Frontline on PBS and we believe it is one of the most powerful ways for folks to help their neighbors abroad.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a library and I help people find information in books and through electronic resources like the Internet and databases.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: It has be powerfully encouraging to the borrowers to know someone on the other side of the world wants to bless them. The word encourage literally means to put the heart in. I hope that my money helps put the heart in these lives. I pray that mercy, peace, love and prosperity will be multiplied in my borrower. Some people don't think I can change the world. But I will tell you if the world doesn't change it won't be because I sat at home and did nothing. I am actually crazy enough to believe I AM changing and taking the world with me.
lender.occupational_info: I work for the US government as a consultant. When the Federal Government need verification of a technical project, I help make sure everything is the way it is suppose to be.

lender.name: Kurt
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate.
lender.occupational_info: I work with programmers to modify bank software.

lender.name: Ronald
lender.loan_because: I want to help others get ahead, and prosper.
lender.occupational_info: My work is hobbies such as gardening fishing hunting and playing with grandchildren

lender.name: Mary Ellen
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I offer administrative/secretarial support to executives in the business world.

lender.name: Nick
lender.loan_because: to keep them healthy and to help people make their lives better. I was born in Cambodia, adopted, and now I live in the United States!

lender.name: Romero
lender.loan_because: it makes a difference.

lender.name: Ellen
lender.occupation: Vice President for a software company
lender.loan_because: I know what it means to get a helping hand.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a software company.

lender.name: Matt
lender.loan_because: Using my spare change to make big changes in peoples lives.
lender.occupational_info: I am a hydrologist at a university in California working to study the effects of global climate change on the water in the Sierra Nevada.

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: helping others is a wonderful way to be connected to the world.

lender.name: Craig
lender.loan_because: I would like to try and help people to fulfill their dreams, and at the same time help improve their lives.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Tammy
lender.loan_because: This is such a great way to see how we are all so connected. Way to go... KIVA!
lender.occupational_info: My brother and I oversee the management of the historical buildings that we rehabbed into affordable and market rate housing.

lender.name: Marty & Barb
lender.loan_because: As citizens of the world who've been richly blessed, we have a responsibility to help those less fortunate.
lender.occupational_info: High School Spanish Teacher (Barb), Environmental Scientist & owner of a small business(Marty)that specializes in conducting ecological surveys throughout the eastern U.S.

lender.name: Jane
lender.loan_because: I believe that KIVA helps make the world a better place, one tiny step at a time. I hope to see extreme poverty significantly reduced worldwide in my lifetime. It can happen if enough people take action to make it happen.
lender.occupational_info: My work has been to teach children to read and write.

lender.name: Justin,Joy,Gabe,Aidan
lender.loan_because: It is the very least I can do to help someone else. Wish I could do more!
lender.occupational_info: My family and I own a small auto recycling yard.

lender.name: Felipe
lender.loan_because: I feel fortunate to live in a country where I'm able to help others in need.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a cubicle and punch numbers all day. I love it though because my hours of punching are very flexible.

lender.name: Crews Family
lender.loan_because: People with access to capital are a key to improving living standards. These funds make it further into the economy than just the people who receive the loans.
lender.occupational_info: I run a software company in Hilton Head SC USA.

lender.name: Clarke
lender.loan_because: I want to do something with my money that makes some sort of difference - this does that in ways I couldn't imagine. I'm so thankful that I found out about Kiva!
lender.occupational_info: I teach computer animation to college students and am in the process of getting a law degree to make a career change. My goal is to practice in the poverty law area.

lender.name: Andrei & Carmen
lender.loan_because: We are immigrants and we started from where most of those requesting loans are now.
lender.occupational_info: medicine

lender.name: Hugh, Mary, Bea and Clem
lender.occupational_info: chef

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: Helping someone in real need is possibly the best feeling you could ever have. I wish I had more to give.

lender.name: Darren
lender.occupational_info: international logistics. import/export consultancy

lender.name: Will
lender.occupational_info: I'm a freshman in college studying Arabic and International Politics. In my spare time, I listen to music, hang out with friends, and work for Western Saharan independence.

lender.name: Don
lender.loan_because: I want to leave the world a better place than I found it.
lender.occupational_info: I manage Maintenance, Custodial, Transportation, Food Service and Capital Projects for a School District.

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: If I can share what I have to help end poverty, then I am extremely happy to do so. We are all in this together.

lender.name: Scott&Teri
lender.loan_because: Giving directly to those it will help and having someone accountable for seeing it used correctly feels more useful than giving to a large faceless organization.
lender.occupational_info: Scott designs video games for modern video game consoles.

lender.name: Ryan
lender.loan_because: One way I can help

lender.name: Karl
lender.loan_because: with these small contributions I can actually make a difference in someone's life. It is a great feeling to help someone.
lender.occupational_info: I calibrate and adjust electronic equipment of all sorts.

lender.name: Bob & Jane
lender.loan_because: I want to bring my LORD glory and honor
lender.occupational_info: Now that we're retired, I really want to focus on helping those in need.

lender.name: Dan
lender.loan_because: Give a man a fish; you have fed him for today. Teach a man to fish; and you have fed him for a lifetimeAuthor unknown

lender.name: Tim
lender.loan_because: I have been at the same spot in life you are. Lots of hard work, belief in yourself, and a small break from someone who can help is all you need to succeed!
lender.occupational_info: I help folks determine what their home is worth, most of the time I do this when the home is used as collateral to get a loan.

lender.name: Mick
lender.loan_because: I have some. They don't.

lender.name: Ivan
lender.loan_because: This is one of the most efficient ways to empower those who would have otherwise never had access to credit.

lender.name: ed
lender.loan_because: life isn't just about yourself.

lender.name: Brent & Lydia
lender.loan_because: I want to help people provide for their families.
lender.occupational_info:
Brent: Software support for an accounting software company.
Lydia: High school teacher (teaching humanities and journalism)

lender.name: Stephen
lender.loan_because: To change someone's life.
lender.occupational_info: I am a retired Boston Police Officer.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: I'm happy and I want everyone to be happy too :)

lender.name: Rubun
lender.loan_because: It is more blessed to give than to receive.

lender.name: Irene
lender.loan_because: when I heard about circumventing traditional, troubled foreign aid I couldn't dismiss the innovative idea! I challenge anyone who hears about Kiva to not join in and help someone!

lender.name: Kristin
lender.loan_because: if not me, who? Change starts with small actions and grows.
lender.occupational_info: I help student volunteer-driven organizations manage their health insurance plans.

lender.name: Hilary & Matt
lender.loan_because: We can and it's a great way to try and make a difference in the world.

lender.name: TOF
lender.loan_because: It is much more rewarding than spending the money on wine, women and song, and doesn't result in a headache, rejection or laryngitis.
lender.occupational_info: Retired mean-spirited Republican, who enjoys joining with others in bipartisan efforts to improve the everyday lives of industrious entrepreneurs in other countries around the world.

lender.name: Randall
lender.loan_because: It's fun.

lender.name: Srinath
lender.loan_because: Money should never be a barrier for those who dare to pursue their dreams
lender.occupational_info: I currently work for SAP, helping the company build loans management products for banks. I plan to be an entreprenuer in the near future.

lender.name: Eve Sanz
lender.loan_because:
Being a small entrepreneur myself, I feel privileged to be able to assist other people who are working hard to get ahead.
Hopefully the recipients wil be able to pay it forward. I had lots of wonderful people help me to get started. :-)
lender.occupational_info: I document the first years in the life of newborn babies and children in the Brandon, Riverview area, in Tampa Bay, FL, creating portraits of them and their families. Our children are the most precious gift on Earth. We owe them a better world.

lender.name: Pierre
lender.loan_because:
we all have a responsibility to help those who need help, in anyway possible. Today's economic problems aren't just for the governments, everyone of us who are priveledged has an obligation to be a catalyst for change.
I don't want to be a cause, I want to be a solution.
lender.occupational_info: School.

lender.name: Harry&Danielle
lender.loan_because: We want to support this activity.
lender.occupational_info: Harry was a pilot for United Airlines and flew international routes. Danielle was a school teacher for young children.

lender.name: Jimbo
lender.loan_because: The loans are made to instill trust in total strangers.
lender.occupational_info: Retired

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: I think microfinance is a great idea, and a sustainable and efficient way to bring about international development.
lender.occupational_info: I am a workers' compensation analyst, and develop methods for quality assurance, and other things. I'm a pretty curious fellow, and enjoy learning things, and scheming.

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: I want to see good people succeed.
lender.occupational_info: I use computer systems to help people work more efficiently.

lender.name: Van
lender.loan_because: Loans are a commitment which encourages accountability and true growth.

lender.name: Travis
lender.loan_because: Why should foreign policy or international aid be the sole arena of governments or large institutions? Who better than the people themselves to foster dignified economic opportunity.

lender.name: Christopher
lender.loan_because: everyone should.
lender.occupational_info: I manage the building of homes.

lender.name: Keith & Stephanie
lender.loan_because: I want to have my students sponsor a loan next school year to teach about economics, geography and culture.

lender.name: CHAD
lender.loan_because: I want to give someone the same opertunities that I have been given and hope that by loaning them the cash they need they will in turn be able to make a difference in their own life.
lender.occupational_info: I am a robot controler @ Honda my work is very detailed and demanding day to day and I love every challenge that I experience, this type of work also gives me a great ability to give to others in need

lender.name: Malia
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: Coordinate translation projects between businesses and freelance translators.

lender.name: Rebecca
lender.loan_because: To help my fellow brothers and sisters less fortunate than me, may God be their helper.

lender.name: Michael J
lender.loan_because: It's a realistic way to help people and I want to help in any way I can. It's a wonderful opportunity.
lender.occupational_info: I manage the day-to-day business for a large Irish brewery in 9 countries in Europe.

lender.name: Mark and Dee Dee
lender.loan_because: Simple way to invest in others outside our borders. We all need a helping hand at times.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a Job Corps center teaching high school to young people in training to turn their lives around. My wife works with her sheep and makes rugs out of wool to sell online.

lender.name: Lisby
lender.loan_because: I can and I should and I must do to make a better world. I also am excited by the chance to see who I am lending to and to cheer them on from afar.
lender.occupational_info: I am a magazine writer and editor. I also design and make jewelry.

lender.name: Fay and Richard
lender.loan_because: Everyone in the world should have the opportunity to use their talents to better their lives and the lives of those around them.
lender.occupational_info: Fay oil paints and Richard photographs both people and places. Currently we are working on a project that depicts the Hawaiian islands.

lender.name: Keith
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power of capitalism and self-reliance to promote prosperity and personal growth.
lender.occupational_info: I fly airplanes to deliver passengers safely and comfortably all over the northern hemisphere of the world.

lender.name: Rebecca
lender.loan_because: Tenacious people should be fostered.
lender.occupational_info: I write short stories.

lender.name: Bobbi
lender.loan_because: The need is great; we can make a difference.

lender.name: Leala & Carlos
lender.loan_because: I believe in investing in the human race.

lender.name: Bill
lender.loan_because: I enjoy helping other people and businesses grow because someone took the time to see and understand my talents and encourage me with seed money.
lender.occupational_info: Discover talents with behavioral testing

lender.name: Bill
lender.loan_because: I believe in empowering people to help themselves out of poverty.
lender.occupational_info: Everyone has a story. I believe we can understand each other better if we know each others stories. I encourage people to listen to others' stories and how to tell their own.

lender.name: Michael Smith
lender.loan_because: It feels good to give and I'd rather win or lose money here for a good cause.
lender.occupational_info: Internet Industry

lender.name: Tracy
lender.loan_because: I believe that blessings should be shared.

lender.name: Terry & Brenda
lender.loan_because: I work with the poverty stricken in South America. I see and feel the pain and despair.
lender.occupational_info: We operate two orphanages and are opening a home for pregnant, teenage girls who are homeless in Peru. Also have a school in Ecuador.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: People have helped me in the past and this is the best way to repay their kindness and generosity
lender.occupational_info: CEO of a US company (Kolb America) that imports German (Staedtler) modeling clay for automotive design studios along with computerized milling machines to create the models.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: Thank you Kiva for the privledge to give back and help those less fortunate .

lender.name: Alan
lender.loan_because: It's a right way to use money.
lender.occupational_info: I am an adult school teacher. Many of my students are from Mexico and Central America.

lender.name: Catharine
lender.loan_because: I have enough and I want to share. I like the idea of helping people in their businesses.
lender.occupational_info: I taught music (singing and instruments) to school children aged 5 to 12. Now one of my favourite things is to grow vegetables in my garden.

lender.name: Trey
lender.loan_because: Being a business credit analyst for a bank here in Texas I understand the difficulty a small business with limited resources has when trying to obtain a loan. This program allows me to help ease that difficulty and I am happy to be contributor.
lender.occupational_info: A perform credit analysis on businesses seeking loans from a regional bank in Texas. I am also responsible for training other credit analysts that work for the bank.

lender.name: Christy
lender.loan_because: It's just. It works. I should.
lender.occupational_info: I teach and write about ethical and justice issues in healthcare and health policy.

lender.name: Janet
lender.loan_because: we heard about this on Public Television and felt that this is a good way we can share our blessings with others.

lender.name: Buz
lender.loan_because: I like helping people.
lender.occupational_info: I work with business to determine how to improve operations and profits with better computer systems. If they agree, I work to make it happen.

lender.name: Michele
lender.loan_because: I would like to see our world become stronger. I believe this can only be done by wiping out poverty across the world, this is a beginning...
lender.occupational_info: I use my skills and resources to contribute to world issues I feel passionate about.

lender.name: Lawrence & Susan
lender.loan_because: We are actively involved in several ministries. When we learned of Kiva it gave us another opportunity to be a blessing to others in response to how others have blessed us. Praise our Lord and Savior!
lender.occupational_info: Larry is a retired executive who now leads mission trips, volunteers in a faith based afterschool program for under privilaged kids, and leads two ministries at our church where Susan is director of the childrens ministry. She also serves with a local Christian womens organization and is a mentor to other women.

lender.name: Al Hoefer
lender.loan_because: I believe in bootstrapping.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: Its needed. & I should.
lender.occupational_info: I make tools that go in all kinds of machines

lender.name: Dean
lender.loan_because: Be the change you wish to see in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I worked 24 years on the county airport maintenance crew (driving snowplow, crash,fire&rescue etc.) and went on disability retirement in 2003 with heart failure. I stay busy with volunteer work, fishing, hunting, and laying around reading.

lender.name: Benjamin
lender.loan_because: I believe that we all are citizens together of the world and need to invest in each other.
lender.occupational_info: I am pastor of an emerging, purpose-driven, evangelical church in Storrs CT.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I want to help a world that I may never fully experience or understand.
lender.occupational_info: I am an artist. My medium is oil paint.

lender.name: Jody & Dean
lender.loan_because: Kiva is a great and direct way to help others be self-sufficient.
lender.occupational_info: Jody: Organizes blood drives to increases blood donations for patients who need it. Dean: Educates Doctors about mental health medications

lender.name: Raj Shahani Memorial
lender.loan_because: Raj always said that "Each of us can change the world by giving". In his passing, the Shahani family is continuing to fulfill his vision. To make a loan through Raj's Team Page, go to: http://www.kiva.org/team/raj_shahani_memorial
lender.occupational_info: In his 30 short years, Rajs boundless energy and kindness impacted the lives of many. As a mentor and inspiration to others, he helped people build their own businesses and better their lives. Raj was an active supporter of Kiva and his hope was that more people would get involved in micro loaning.

lender.name: Travis
lender.loan_because: I am a Christian Entrepreneur and love the idea of giving to other businesses and helping them become successful. To show the love of Christ.

lender.name: Sri & Sudha
lender.loan_because: We like to help people in need. This is the least we can do.

lender.name: Brouwer
lender.loan_because: I believe that microfinance is the way of the future and sustainable investments are key to moving society forward.

lender.name: Steve & Maggie
lender.loan_because: We have supported small business all our lives, by buying what we need from small business, whenever we can. Now we want to help in another very important way.
lender.occupational_info: Steve sells used and out-of-print books on the Internet; Maggie is a librarian.

lender.name: Serge
lender.loan_because: I can see where all my money is actually going, and the real person who benefits from all this.
lender.occupational_info: I work mostly in R&D high technology, building and testing prototypes of all sorts, for industrial and consumer goods. I also teach Taekwondo to children, and adults.

lender.name: Jon M.
lender.loan_because: I don't have much but, I still have more than most of these people. I want them to have a chance at a good start like people in this country.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: The people i can help thru my modest contributions deserve a better life. They ask little, 'some' help. I have spent time in africa in the bush and know what 'a little help' can mean to them. I must help, it's that simple.
lender.occupational_info: I have worked for thirty years in an ambulance taking care of the sick and injured. I provide medical care and transport to the hospital.

lender.name: Lorenz
lender.loan_because: I believe in the effectiveness of micro-loans to help people achieve their goals.
lender.occupational_info: I work with small and medium-sized businesses, contributing to their success by conducting strategic planning, developing business plans, and doing marketing research.

lender.name: Malynn and Simba
lender.loan_because: We both grew up in developing countries and are well aware of the challenges facing those with limited opportunities.

lender.name: White Family
lender.loan_because: We love God and we want to share what He's given us with others to help them.
lender.occupational_info: I love people and help them grow.

lender.name: Anand
lender.loan_because: I want to contribute to any social entrepreneurship initiative; it is empowerment not donation that would make a real difference and I admire Kiva for standing by that. I would increase my contributions regularly and spread the word to my friends.
lender.occupational_info: I'm with Schlumberger an Oil Field Services company. I travel a lot on work and tourism, hope to see physically some KIVA initiatives. I want to teach english, math and science to kids in the developing world during free time and sabbaticals. My travel plans include countries in Africa and S America. So far I have traveled in over 35 countries all over the world.

lender.name: Derek
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed with resources and wish to help industrious people to build and grow their businesses
lender.occupational_info: I assist attorneys with the transfer of electronic information in litigation.

lender.name: Yul
lender.loan_because: It feels good and it is the right path

lender.name: Marco
lender.loan_because: I wanna help.
lender.occupational_info: I do many things but my real passion is in helping people get access to the Internet.

lender.name: wenford
lender.occupational_info: hard . but i like it !

lender.name: Sachin
lender.loan_because: I have a passion of helping those who are in need.

lender.name: Martin
lender.loan_because: I loan to others because God has blessed me. Now I can bless others.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a retired teacher - junior high, high school and college.

lender.name: William
lender.loan_because: When I give, I want to know it's really making a difference. Kiva's loans make sure that happens. It feels great knowing that someone will have the opportunity to improve their life, and that I played a small role in that. Now that I've found Kiva, I'm excited to tell all my friends how they can make a difference, too!
lender.occupational_info: Business: I help people change habits through hypnosis (e.g., smoking, lose weight, overcome fear). Personal: I believe if you're fortunate, it's important to share your blessings with others.

lender.name: Kim & Cyril
lender.loan_because: I can and should.

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: I can and I care
lender.occupational_info: I ensure projects in the computer industry complete successfully

lender.name: Brenda and Rick
lender.loan_because: We want to help people to have a chance to have a better life.

lender.name: Laura & Tim
lender.occupational_info: I work on implementing electronic medical records in a doctor's office.

lender.name: Paula
lender.loan_because: I want to make life easier for other people. People have taken chances on me at times.
lender.occupational_info: Helping children.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: At one time I needed a little loan to start my business. It didn't take much , yet it changed my life.

lender.name: Chitra & Joaquin
lender.loan_because: We can and we should.
lender.occupational_info: Chitra takes care of the kids, and Joaquin tries to be a good student and likes to play video games too.

lender.name: Natascha
lender.loan_because: I would like to give back

lender.name: Joe-Joe
lender.occupational_info: I am a critical multicultural educator. My current position is as Assistant Head of School for Diversity and Associate Dean of Faculty for the Ethical Culture Fieldston School, a large independent school in NYC and the Bronx.

lender.name: Karl
lender.loan_because: Even a bird can make a difference.

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: it seems like a good way to help others. This is important to me.

lender.name: Mildred
lender.loan_because: I've needed help and gotten it, and I want to help others, too.
lender.occupational_info: My work is to help the world be a better place by being a better person.

lender.name: pearse
lender.occupational_info: Promote renewable energy and energy efficiency in developing countries

lender.name: William
lender.loan_because: I just simply want to help people.

lender.name: Colleen
lender.loan_because: People who are willing to try hard should be supported regardless of their economic status.

lender.name: Anna
lender.loan_because: I feel it's important to give back to communities and to help people realize their dreams

lender.name: Timothy
lender.loan_because: I am saintly. No, actually this is probably the least I could do... but Im doing it! More power to those hearts and minds that go into this work, you are making this world a better place in a very tangible way.
lender.occupational_info: I teach students how to swim (part of the physical education curriculum) in the Toronto District School Board.

lender.name: Benni
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: Retired and working part time in travel seeing the world.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: This is why we are all here on earth ... to help each other.

lender.name: Lynaya
lender.loan_because: It's important to the status of all women to be able to sustain their lives and families independently.
lender.occupational_info: Help women understand and make choices regarding their reproductive health.

lender.name: Roger, Wan, Mira & Rya
lender.loan_because: We need to help small business owners, they are the backbone of most economies.

lender.name: Alicia
lender.loan_because: I believe in the human connections necessary to better our world.
lender.occupational_info: I own a fair trade retail business which, among others, ensures artisans across the world receive fair wages, work in safe conditions, and follow environmentally sustainable practices. I also believe strongly in creating human connections between the producers and consumers.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Brenda
lender.loan_because: I have been fortunate to have all that I need.

lender.name: Benjamin
lender.loan_because: To make a positive difference in this world.
lender.occupational_info: Web based direct sales

lender.name: Claire & Jeremy
lender.loan_because: We want to help people help themselves. There are so many people all over the world doing wonderful things and we love being a part of that.
lender.occupational_info: Claire is a first grade teacher for 18 wonderful children. Jeremy is an energy engineer working in the sustainable building industry.

lender.name: Sonya and Ed
lender.loan_because: My husband and I want to help people in a way that can really work and make a difference because we have been helped by a network of people
lender.occupational_info: My husband (saxophone)and I (viola)teach a variety of music classes at a college in Massachusetts, USA

lender.name: psykickgirl
lender.loan_because: This site is a brilliant idea to let one human being help another and cut out the "middle man".

lender.name: Rita
lender.loan_because: I have to be the change I wish to see in the world. Peace and blessings to you all; live long and prosper!
lender.occupational_info: I am a registered nurse in a veteran's hospital.

lender.name: Julie
lender.loan_because: Just lending a hand...everyone needs help sometime.

lender.name: Randy and Jamie
lender.loan_because: We have owned a business ourselves and want to take the opportunity to partner with people who want to start businesses and are motivated to improve themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: I am a dentist, but have done a lot of dentistry in foreign countries also. My wife is a teacher and a business partner with me in the dental field.

lender.name: linn
lender.loan_because: I care!

lender.name: baduncadonk
lender.loan_because: access to capital should not be an accident of birth.

lender.name: Pete
lender.loan_because: It's about time.
lender.occupational_info: I try to do the best I can for my family, friends and the people I work for.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: I have experienced the hospitality and generosity of others during my travels, and a loan to return the same is the smallest of thanks I can provide.
lender.occupational_info: I help people to gain perspective on how they are running their business, suggest ways to improve their products and their relationships with other organizations, and offer suggestions on how to meet their business plans.

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: It is wonderful to see directly how you can make an impact in the world. I know where my money is going and it is not wasted on administration and salaries like at some larger charities!

lender.name: Dave
lender.loan_because: the world changes one person at a time.

lender.name: Elaine
lender.loan_because: I like to know that an individual can help another individual almost directly.

lender.name: B..
lender.loan_because: This is exactly what the world needs.

lender.name: Kevin
lender.occupational_info: Write programs for computers.

lender.name: Dave
lender.occupational_info: I sell commercial heating equipment that heats large buildings such as schools, churches and office buildings.

lender.name: Amanda
lender.loan_because: I think great things can happen when people give just a little.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a small folk art gallery and a cool funky clothing shop.

lender.name: Matthew L. Byrne
lender.loan_because:
Anyone willing to work should be able to improve their living conditions. I'm well-paid (not by lawyer standards, but what are those, anyway?) and it's time to spread the wealth.
And it's a loan! Assuming I get repaid, it's no trouble to me. And if not, I won't go hungry.
lender.occupational_info: I work to overturn death sentences on appeal. There are many problems in cases involving the death sentence -- it seems to bring out the worst in our judicial system.

lender.name: Julie
lender.loan_because: It works. It's effective. It's easy. What's not to like. How intelligent apply our communication tools to fund humanitarian work. A good thing.

lender.name: Charles & Audrey
lender.loan_because: Money is a resource that can be shared at no cost to the lender and great benefit to the borrower.

lender.name: Madison
lender.loan_because: I want to help people with their businesses so they can have better lives.
lender.occupational_info: I am an elementary school student.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I must.

lender.name: Dawn
lender.loan_because: I want to support people helping themselves. This is a wonderful idea, an absolutely brilliant use of this amazing technology we call the internet. I applaud the people who conceived of and work with Kiva. Hats off to all the entrepreneurs. I'll tell all my friends about you.
lender.occupational_info: I manage a group of people who develop software that is used to collect and diseminate news throughout the world.

lender.name: Krissy and Steve
lender.loan_because: This account was started for our wedding. In place of gifts to us, our family and friends have given loans to others. We'll maintain the account on Kiva and reinvest loan repayments to other people.

lender.name: Joan
lender.loan_because: It is my way of giving something back for all that I have been blessed with. I am an entrepreneur myself and enjoy the challenge of starting new businesses. It takes courage, passion and determination. I am excited about this opportunity for me and will share Kiva with my friends
lender.occupational_info: I love my job as a hairdresser. I am in business for myself and enjoy creating with styles and colour. My field is always changing and that keeps me from getting bored. I am a makeup artist and photo stylist for print/TV Commercials, etc.

lender.name: Rob Womack
lender.loan_because: I'm privileged to have the opportunity to participate in this project.
lender.occupational_info: I help people sell large computer systems.

lender.name: Katie
lender.loan_because: I am Catholic and believe in the parable of the talents (Luke 19:11-26). If we don't invest what we have in what matters most, people & peace, we will always live in a violent and unjust world. With this site, even a student living on a tight budget can make a significant difference in the lives of families worldwide- all we need be is courageous and unselfish.
lender.occupational_info: I am a university student who is learning to be a scientist. I work in a lab that is trying to make an AIDS vaccine.

lender.name: Michael & Carol
lender.loan_because: It's truly a way of helping others help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: Michael maintains weather stations in the remote mashlands of Central Florida by airboat. Carol works in a cardiac unit at the city hospital as a nurse.

lender.name: paul
lender.loan_because: I HAVE BEEN BLESSED AND THERE IS A WORLD OF NEED.
lender.occupational_info: I WORK ON AN EMERGENCY AMBULANCE TRANSPORTING SICK AND INJURED PEOPLE TO THE HOSPITAL.

lender.name: JORDAN and Grandma HOPE
lender.occupation: Grade School student & An Executive Receptionist

lender.name: terry
lender.loan_because: I have had my own business in the past. I know what a little faith and some money can do to help a small business.
lender.occupational_info: I work with a great group of people who bring performances to school children around the world. (I talk on the phone with schools to schedule performances)

lender.name: Michael T.
lender.loan_because: I believe that small businesses are what drives the world's economy, and I want to help other individuals, who, like myself are entrepreneurs and need the financial backing
lender.occupational_info: I work with small businesses to help them start up, grow, and continue their businesses. My degress are in Management & entrepreneurship, but my primary job as a consultant is accounting

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: Helping someone in business in an effective way of improving the family, the community, and the well being of everyone involved. Plus business has to do with hopes and dreams and perseverance and achievement. All things that put a smile on your face.
lender.occupational_info: I paint the interior and exterior of houses and buildings. I prepare the surfaces and apply beautiful coats of paint. I employ six painters who are all tradesmen in their field.

lender.name: yang
lender.loan_because: I come from a very small city in the westen part of china and as you know the average of the families of the westen part are poor.My parents use all of their money to afford my college fees so my family now is drapped into a very poor and bad situation.however,I am a optimistic girl,now I want to do something to change the economic situation for myself and for my family.I want to run a small business like saling colth or some beautiful things for girls.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student now,i will graduate from my university this july. I hope i can begin a new life and change my whole families living quality.I've learned art for about 10 years and I have very excellent eyes of clothes and beautiful things for girls.I want to open a small shop to sale something special even something I do by my hand.And I reslly need some money to rent a shop and buy some materials.

lender.name: Sharon
lender.loan_because: this program provides a way to make a difference in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I am an attorney by training, but spend time every year in Africa on humanitarian missions. Currently we are working in Zimbabwe drilling boreholes to provide fresh water to AIDS orphans.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I believe in sharing our prosperity here in North America with others in need.

lender.name: Sean
lender.loan_because: I'm happy to have to the opportunity -- thank you KIVA and PBS Frontline for inspiring those who can to help out those in need
lender.occupational_info: I teach history and coach basketball at a public middle school in San Francisco, California

lender.name: Jere
lender.loan_because: Country-to-Country lending isn't as effective as it should be and peer-to-peer lending might be part of the answer. I can help someone make a potentially life-altering leap without leaving my desk. Wow!
lender.occupational_info: Like many of Kiva's borrowers, I sell things.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: i can. i have been provided opportunity and I want to do the same.
lender.occupational_info: i spend a lot of time at a computer. when I am not at a computer I travel around with my camera and take photos of various places and objects and sometimes sell the use of my photos to people and organizations that want to use.

lender.name: Gabriel
lender.loan_because: To do my small part
lender.occupational_info: Funtastic

lender.name: Mr. Black
lender.loan_because: I like business. I like entrepeneurs. I want to help if I can. Help those who help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I manage a bookstore. I sell books. I hire book and cafe sellers. We sell books, music, movies, and have a cafe. I love books, love to sell them, love to make people happy with good books. I also like business.

lender.name: Michael and Mila
lender.loan_because: It seems like a good system to help those who need with out the greed.
lender.occupational_info:
I program CNC Machines to carve out parts out of solid metal.
My wife works for a law firm doing legal Secretary work.

lender.name: Ryan
lender.loan_because: I'm lucky enough to be able to.

lender.name: Emily
lender.loan_because: I believe in people and their abilities. There are very few other feelings in the world more fulfilling than the sense of pride and accomplishment. Everyone should have the opportunity to know the feeling!

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: I have travelled a lot through Mexico and Central People and seen how many of the people there struggle. The kindness of the people there has given me many wonderful memories of my trips so I am happy to try to help better the lives of people in these countries and elsewhere.
lender.occupational_info: I assist clients to lease, buy and sell homes and investment properties in the Greater Miami Area, with a focus on Miami Beach and Downtown Miami.

lender.name: Dorothy
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves the opportunity of taking their own future into their hands.
lender.occupational_info:
I see myself as helping individuals become what they are, remove barriers and develop their potential. I use coaching techniques, NLP and EFT to this aim.
I am also a facilitator of learning and I specialize in the field of efficiency and performance at the office. More can be found on the website http://www.performance-partners.eu
